text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1992. ==Events== *29 February - Lotte Nilsson and Kenny Lübcke are selected to represent Denmark at the 1992 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Alt det som ingen ser". They are selected to be the twenty-fifth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Aalborghallen in Aalborg. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1992 in Denmark
title: 1992 in Danish television
